name: Silvio Tacchi
subtitle: Seasoned Manager with 25 years+ experience in Hi-Tech Sales & Marketing roles both in B2B and Retail market, Comfortable leading & developing teams & managing changes to support business growth
about: I have a solid foundation in marketing theory, rich experience in practical marketing, account management and planning, and some experience in business management. I have a keen strategic vision and the ability to plan strategically, a rigorous level of implementation of marketing techniques and tactics, a professional after-sales service concept, as well as the corresponding public relations planning thinking, with good communication skills and written expression skills. I am passionate about public welfare
experiences: Bridge the worlds of retail (digital and physical), corporate, and business development by combining the company vision with field execution and by working with all partners to create future business success for Apple

Managing Top Business Partners (Impresa24 & Mondoesa), focused primarily on marketing activities for lead generation, supervising commercial processes (deals, pipeline, forecast, invoiced etc) and financial risk.

Responsible for direct sales growth, establishing local network & managing key accounts.
Responsible for the overall sales performance, smoothing out the action of direct and indirect sales on the SBE market.

Responsible for the regional direct business, managing a multi-functional Team through different industries and projects (ERP, portals, eCommerce, SCM, Business Intelligence, management and administrative staff). Involved in K-accounts Management.
Start-up business, having ESA Software as main partner, targetting businesses of Emilia Romagna and Marche. Finally merged with ESA to ensure growth.
